property.name: fs.default.name
property.description: The filesystem to work with.

property.name: service.monitor.portprobe.host
property.description: Host to probe via a telnet operation

property.name: service.monitor.webprobe.url
property.description: URL to get

property.name: service.monitor.pidprobe.enabled
property.description: Flag to indicate whether or not the Process ID Probe is enabled.

property.name: service.monitor.pidprobe.pidfile
property.description: The file containing the Process ID (PID) of the launched service.

property.name: service.monitor.portprobe.port
property.description: Port to probe via a telnet operation

property.name: service.monitor.report.classname
property.description: The class to use for reporting heartbeats. This is a low-level property that is not intended for customization.

property.name: service.monitor.report.interval
property.description: Interval in milliseconds for sending heartbeats status to vSphere

property.name: service.monitor.probe.interval
property.description: Time in milliseconds between the last probe cycle ending and the new one beginning. The shorter this cycle, the faster failures are detected, but slightly more CPU, network and server load can be generated.

property.name: service.monitor.probe.timeout
property.description: How long in milliseconds does the probe loop have to be blocked before that is considered a liveness failure

property.name: service.monitor.bootstrap.timeout
property.description: The time in milliseconds for the monitor to wait for the service to bootstrap and become available before it reports a failure to the management infrastructure

property.name: service.monitor.portprobe.enabled
property.description: is the probe enabled

property.name: service.monitor.portprobe.connect.timeout
property.description: Port probing key : timeout of the connection attempt

property.name: service.monitor.lsprobe.enabled
property.description: enable the LS probe

property.name: service.monitor.lsprobe.path
property.description: The path for the LS probe

property.name: service.monitor.webprobe.enabled
property.description: is the HTTP probe enabled

property.name: service.monitor.webprobe.min
property.description: Minimum acceptable HTTP code (After redirects)

property.name: service.monitor.webprobe.max
property.description: Maximum acceptable HTTP code (After redirects)

property.name: service.monitor.webprobe.connect.timeout
property.description: Timeout of the HTTP connection attempt

property.name: service.monitor.jtprobe.enabled
property.description: Enable monitoring of the JT defined in the "mapred.job.tracker" property

property.name: service.monitor.krb5Enabled
property.description: Is monitor kerberos enabled, set it to true if the hadoop cluster is secured with kerberos

property.name: service.monitor.krb5Principal
property.description: kerberos principal

property.name: service.monitor.krb5Keytab
property.description: kerberos keytab for the principal
